contents.text: A Boost in momentum forwards. Way more useful in the air.
When grounded, you rise in the air. If you already are in the air you simply stall for a bit. After a short while you slam into the ground, dealing 4.8❤ and stunning everyone in range for 1 second.
A Boost upwards. In general, you have an elytra. When exceeding a certain speed while flying, your melee attacks get buffed to 4.6❤ (with a crit, that would be 6.9❤) until you touch the ground.
